custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the webview item is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the webview is launched
AND the view title is displayed

title: Nav menu replacement
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user in the MLB app
WHEN a nav tab element is replaced in the config.json
THEN the tab button is replaced

NOTE: Replace storage.mobile.mlbinfra.com//atbatconfig/appnavigation_en.json with the webdest.json found in the ANDROID-10498 JIRA ticket

title: Default Bottom Navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user opens the MLB app
WHEN the user completes onboarding
AND there are no special events like draft day, all star game, etc...
THEN the user will see the default bottom navigation elements consisting of the user's #1 team, Scores, News, Watch, and More

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13345729)

title: More menu navigation
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has launched and signed into the app
WHEN a user taps on the More menu
THEN the user will be show a full-screen nav page (with bottom nav still visible) with the following elements:
- User's name and email at the top of the page
- Top image featuring user's #1 team
- Gear button to take user to settings page
- The following links, taking user to the appropriate screens and views: Standings, Stats, Audio, Teams, MLB Podcasts, Starting Lineups, Baseball Savant, Prospect Rankings, MLB Shop, Connect with MLB, Auctions, Play Ball, MLB Trivia, MLB Ballpark, MLB Play, MiLB First Pitch, MLB Home Run Derby, FAQs, Subscription Management, Contact Us, Blackout Restrictions, Privacy Policy, Terms of Use, Do Not Sell My Personal Data, Settings, About MLB

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13345730)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13345731)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13345732)
